Resources

Law Enforcement:

For emergencies, call 911, for any other incident that requires the response of a deputy; call 281-341-4665 (Fort Bend County Non-Emergency Number).

Fire:

Fire Protection is provided by the Fulshear-Simonton Fire Department

Emergency: Call 911
FSFD (Non-Emergency) Phone: 281-346-2800
ESD#4 Phone: 281-533-0095

Other Crisis Resources:
  • Suicide Prevention Lifeline
    24-Hour Suicide Prevention Hotline
    Phone: 800-273-TALK (8255) or 988
  • Child and Elder Abuse Hotline
    24-Hour Abuse or Neglect Hotline
    Phone: 800-252-5400
  • National Human Trafficking Hotline
    24-Hour Human Trafficking Hotline
    Phone: 888-373-7888 or text HELP or INFO to 233733
  • Fort Bend County Women’s Center
    24-Hour Domestic Violence and Sexual Assault Crisis Hotline
    Phone: 281-342-4357
  • National Domestic Violence Hotline
    24-Hour Domestic Abuse Hotline
    Phone: 800-799-7233 or text LOVEIS TO 866-331-9474
  • Texana Behavorial Crisis Hotline
    24-Hour Behavioral Crisis Hotline
    Phone: 800-633-5686
  • Texas Center for the Missing
    24-Hour Missing Persons Assistance
    Phone: 713-599-0235
  • Veterans Crisis Line
    24-Hour Veteran Support Hotline    
    Phone: 1-800-273-8255 or text 838255 or Call 988 and Press 1

Local Organizations:

Weston Lakes Property Owner’s Association

  • Weston Lakes POA- (281) 533-9108
  • Weston Lakes Subdivision Front Gate non-visitor issues- (281) 533-0055
  • Weston Lakes Subdivision Front Gate Auto Attendant- (844) 966-4070
  • Bowser Road (West Gate) Gatehouse Personnel – (281) 533-4077
